message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $90. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $70?
I understand you're looking for a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $82.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $77?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $80, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. What do you say?
